name: THE BLANC HACK: A WHITEHACK FKR
name_original: THE BLANC HACK: A WHITEHACK FKR
description:
A loving, Free Kriegsspiel Revolution, six-sided-die-only tribute to one of the most enthralling OSR games out there: The Whitehack by Christian Mehrstam.

Please support Christian by checking out his work: Whitehack Third Edition – Quality Rules (wordpress.com)
